fields.name: values
fields.desc: The currently selected values for this range slider.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the user is selecting a new value for the slider by dragging.

fields.name: onChangeStart
fields.desc: Called when the user starts selecting new values for the slider.

fields.name: onChangeEnd
fields.desc: Called when the user is done selecting new values for the slider.

fields.name: min
fields.desc: The minimum value the user can select.

fields.name: max
fields.desc: The maximum value the user can select.

fields.name: labels
fields.desc: Labels to show as text in the [SliderThemeData.rangeValueIndicatorShape] when the slider is active and [SliderThemeData.showValueIndicator] is satisfied.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: The color of the track's active segment, i.e. the span of track between the thumbs.

fields.name: inactiveColor
fields.desc: The color of the track's inactive segments, i.e. the span of tracks between the min and the start thumb, and the end thumb and the max.

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: The highlight color that's typically used to indicate that the range slider thumb is hovered or dragged.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: semanticFormatterCallback
fields.desc: The callback used to create a semantic value from the slider's values.
